case_studies.title: Case Study 1: Product Modeling
case_studies.description:
All For Foodies is an American company catering to the needs of serious foodies. They want to launch an online business for selling vouchers for their online cooking classes.

commercetools acts as PIM and Order Management System.

All For Foodies currently sells:

  • Online French cooking class, $39.99
  • Online Italian cooking class, $39.99
  • Online Middle Eastern cooking class, $39.99
  • Online Soup cooking class, $25.99
  • Online Grilling class, $22.99

Create a product model using a product type Online Offering, products and variants of your choice.

Draft the solution in the Notes field together with a team in a breakout room.

Discuss then your model with the trainer before creating it in the Merchant Center.

If time allows, your trainer will discuss further requirements from the Case Study Document.
